verses.verse: The <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G1078>generation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>.

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2421>Jesse<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>her<s%> that had been the wife <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3774>Uriah<s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2502>Josiah<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2423>Jechoniah<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G80>brethren<s%>, at the <S%G1909>time<s%> of <S%G846>the<s%> carrying away <S%G3350>to<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%>.

Woe <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary<s%>, <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

Ye <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1074>generations<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> are <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the carrying away <S%G3350>to<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the carrying away <S%G3350>to<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations<s%>.

And <S%G1083><s%>, the birth of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> on this <S%G3779>wise<s%>: <S%G1063>When<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> had been <S%G3423>betrothed<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>, <S%G4250>before<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> came <S%G4905>together<s%> she was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2192>with<s%> <S%G1064>child<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G435>husband<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2532>man<s%>, and <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G3856>make<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> a public <S%G3856>example<s%>, was <S%G1014>minded<s%> to <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G2977>privily<s%>.

He <S%G1760>when<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> thought <S%G1760>on<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>, thou <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to take unto <S%G3880>thee<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>: for <S%G1063>that<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1080>conceived<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> she shall bring <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>JESUS<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G846>he<s%> that shall <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G2443>pass<s%>, that it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5259>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the <S%G3933>virgin<s%> shall <S%G2192>be<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1064>child<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall bring <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> they shall <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1694>Immanuel<s%>; <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, being <S%G3177>interpreted<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1326>arose<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> his <S%G5258>sleep<s%>, and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4367>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> took unto <S%G3880>him<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>;
